players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Bob was a good player. We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
Diana: "I agree, Charlie. We should all share our thoughts and any observations from last night. Alice, what do you think happened?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of someone more suspicious? This seems like a risky first move."

Charlie: "Alice, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you really were the detective, wouldn't it be smarter to keep that information hidden until you had more evidence? This feels like a desperate mafia play to me."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie and he is mafia. We must vote him out now."
